mapper.select: select mealkit.carts.*, mealkit.mealkits.mealkit_name, mealkit.mealkits.mealkit_img_file_name, mealkit.mealkits.price from mealkit.carts join mealkit.mealkits on mealkit.carts.mealkit_num = mealkit.mealkits.mealkit_num join mealkit.users on mealkit.carts.user_id = mealkit.users.user_id where mealkit.users.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT CARTS.*, MEALKITS.MEALKIT_NAME, MEALKITS.MEALKIT_IMG_FILE_NAME, MEALKITS.PRICE FROM CARTS JOIN MEALKITS ON CARTS.MEALKIT_NUM = MEALKITS.MEALKIT_NUM JOIN USERS ON CARTS.USER_ID = USERS.USER_ID WHERE USERS.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTS(USER_ID, MEALKIT_NUM, MEALKIT_COUNT) values (#{userId}, #{mealkitNum}, #{mealkitCount})
mapper.delete: DELETE CARTS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MEALKIT_NUM = #{mealkitNum}
